Package com.uzh.ase.dailygrind.postservice.config

Class DynamoDBConfig

java.lang.Object
com.uzh.ase.dailygrind.postservice.config.DynamoDBConfig
@Configuration public class DynamoDBConfig extends Object
Configuration class for setting up DynamoDB client and tables.

This configuration class sets up the DynamoDB client, enhanced DynamoDB client, and DynamoDB tables for various entities, including Post, Comment, Like, DailyPost, PinnedPost, User, and Friend. The configuration is only applied when the profile is not "test" (specified by the !test profile annotation).

  • Method Details

    • dynamoDbClient

      @Bean @Profile("!test") public software.amazon.awssdk.services.dynamodb.DynamoDbClient dynamoDbClient(software.amazon.awssdk.auth.credentials.AwsCredentialsProvider credentialsProvider)
      Creates and configures a DynamoDbClient instance for interacting with DynamoDB.

      This bean configures the DynamoDbClient to connect to the DynamoDB service, using the provided credentials provider and region, as well as a custom base URL for local or test environments.

      Parameters:
      credentialsProvider - the AWS credentials provider
      Returns:
      the configured DynamoDbClient instance

    • postTable

      @Bean public software.amazon.awssdk.enhanced.dynamodb.DynamoDbTable<PostEntity> postTable(software.amazon.awssdk.enhanced.dynamodb.DynamoDbEnhancedClient dynamoDbEnhancedClient)
      Creates and configures a DynamoDbTable for the PostEntity.

      This bean provides a table for interacting with the DynamoDB table that stores PostEntity objects. It uses the TableSchema to map the PostEntity class to the corresponding DynamoDB table.

      Parameters:
      dynamoDbEnhancedClient - the enhanced DynamoDb client
      Returns:
      the configured DynamoDbTable for PostEntity
